title: Keir Starmer's own allies admit he's 'too weak to sack Wes Streeting' - PM could still face coup
tags: Keir Starmer tells MPs ‘I’ve won every fight I’ve been in’ as he clings to job;'Either Keir Starmer or Wes Streeting must go - the fate of our system depends on it,' Jacob Rees-Mogg says;Andy Burnham takes veiled swipe at Keir Starmer but backs PM with Labour civil war warning;The GB News Editorial Charter
